org.apache.cocoon.webapps.authentication.acting
Class AuthLoggedInAction

java.lang.Object
  ServiceableAction
      org.apache.cocoon.webapps.authentication.acting.AuthLoggedInAction
Deprecated. The authentication-fw block is deprecated and will be removed in future versions. But the new auth framework is not documented for Cocoon 2.1. 

public class AuthLoggedInAction
extends ServiceableAction

This is an improved version of the authentication and the loggedin action, which checks the role of a user if the role parameter is specified. If the user is not authenticated, a redirect (as in the authentication action) will take place if the 'redirect' parameter is true. Otherwise, the action will just fail. If the user is authenticated, but does not have the required role, the action will fail.
